name: Puw
content:
Puw was a member of the Nihil marauder organization during the High Republic Era. Puw and another Nihil, commanded by a Storm, attacked Agricultural Hub 42, a factory on the astronomical object Chortose, in order to attain its sprayer droids. Jedi Knight Keeve Trennis intervened, fighting back against the Nihil and striking one of them with a deflected blaster bolt. With the help of Jedi Wayseeker Orla Jareni, Puw and the Nihil's Storm was killed, and Jareni placed the remaining Nihil in binders.
Puw appeared in the comic The High Republic  7, written by Cavan Scott, penciled by Georges Jeanty, and published by Marvel Comics on July 28, 2021. The comic shows Puw and two other Nihil, a Devlikk and a Draethos, participate in the attack, with the Storm giving an order to Puw; however, there is no indication as to which of the two Nihil was being referred to.
